resources.string: %s permission is permanently declined, please go to settings and enable it
We need the permission to use the camera.
This app relies on camera to take photos.
We need to write external storage to save your images and videos.
This app needs to write to external storage to save photos and videos.
We need to this permission reach all images in your app
We need to read external storage to save your images and videos.
This app needs to read to external storage to reach photos and videos.
